title: LEMON DIMPLES
directions: Butter with sugars until light mixer to white and fluffy. Mixing add the egg, zest and lemon juice, vanilla. Mix well.
Mix flour, baking powder, add to the weight of butter. Mix.
Ready dough form into a ball, flatten slightly, wrap in cling film and cool for an hour in the refrigerator.
Prepare the lemon curd - to translate it to a piping bag (you can also apply it with a spoon).

Prepare a flat baking tray, put the baking paper or mat Teflon. From chilled dough to form small balls (my weighed approx. 13 g one), put on a baking tray in the interval (grow). Each cake flatten and make it deep and wide cavity (almost to the sheet; otherwise the dough will rise and lemon curd cakes comes out with, and I did cap of alcohol). Fill Lemon curd (about 1 teaspoon to 1 cake).
Bake at 180 Â° C for about 15 minutes. Cool on wire rack.
ingredients: 180 g of butter at room temperature
half a cup of powdered sugar
1/4 cup caster sugar for baking (or less)
